column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Love the decor of this place
column2: it's dark and very hip especially the seating in the middle of the restaurant where they have rocks on the table that divide it up
column4: not the best ramen I have had but still good
column5: flavor of the broth is just about right in seasoning and the pork was really soft
column6: great service and has free parking
